verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> The word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> also came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> of man בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst בֵּית־ <WH1004> house הַמֶּ֖רִי <WH4805> of a rebellious אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you יֹשֵׁ֑ב <WH3427> thou dwellest אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who עֵינַיִם֩ <WH5869> which have eyes לָהֶ֨ם לִרְא֜וֹת <WH7200> to see וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not רָא֗וּ <WH7200> and see אָזְנַ֨יִם <WH241> not they have ears לָהֶ֤ם לִשְׁמֹ֙עַ֙ <WH8085> to hear וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not שָׁמֵ֔עוּ <WH8085> and hear כִּ֛י <WH3588> for בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> house מְרִ֖י <WH4805> not for they [are] a rebellious הֵֽם׃ <WH1992> like

וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you בֶן־ <WH1121> Therefore thou son אָדָ֗ם <WH120> of man עֲשֵׂ֤ה <WH6213> prepare לְךָ֙ כְּלֵ֣י <WH3627> thee stuff גוֹלָ֔ה <WH1473> for removing וּגְלֵ֥ה <WH1540> and remove יוֹמָ֖ם <WH3119> by day לְעֵֽינֵיהֶ֑ם <WH5869> in their sight וְגָלִ֨יתָ <WH1540> and thou shalt remove מִמְּקוֹמְךָ֜ <WH4725> from thy place אֶל־ <WH413> about מָק֤וֹם <WH4725> place אַחֵר֙ <WH312> to another לְעֵ֣ינֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5869> in their sight אוּלַ֣י <WH194> Perhaps יִרְא֔וּ <WH7200> it may be they will consider כִּ֛י <WH3588> though בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> house מְרִ֖י <WH4805> though they [be] a rebellious הֵֽמָּה׃ <WH1992> like

וְהוֹצֵאתָ֨ <WH3318> Then shalt thou bring forth כֵלֶ֜יךָ <WH3627> thy stuff כִּכְלֵ֥י <WH3627> as stuff גוֹלָ֛ה <WH1473> for removing יוֹמָ֖ם <WH3119> by day לְעֵֽינֵיהֶ֑ם <WH5869> in their sight וְאַתָּ֗ה <WH859> you תֵּצֵ֤א <WH3318> and thou shalt go forth בָעֶ֙רֶב֙ <WH6153> at even לְעֵ֣ינֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5869> in their sight כְּמוֹצָאֵ֖י <WH4161> as they that go forth גּוֹלָֽה׃ <WH1473> into captivity
לְעֵינֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5869> in their sight חֲתָר־ <WH2864> Dig לְךָ֣ בַקִּ֑יר <WH7023> thou through the wall וְהוֹצֵאתָ֖ <WH3318> and carry out בּֽוֹ׃

לְעֵ֨ינֵיהֶ֜ם <WH5869> In their sight עַל־ <WH5921> above כָּתֵ֤ף <WH3802> [it] upon [thy] shoulders תִּשָּׂא֙ <WH5375> shalt thou bear בָּעֲלָטָ֣ה <WH5939> in the twilight תוֹצִ֔יא <WH3318> [and] carry [it] forth פָּנֶ֣יךָ <WH6440> thy face תְכַסֶּ֔ה <WH3680> thou shalt cover וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> you cannot תִרְאֶ֖ה <WH7200> that thou see אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> not the ground כִּֽי־ <WH3588> as מוֹפֵ֥ת <WH4159> thee [for] a sign נְתַתִּ֖יךָ <WH5414> for I have set לְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> unto the house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וָאַ֣עַשׂ <WH6213> And I did כֵּן֮ <WH3651> so כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> I צֻוֵּיתִי֒ <WH6680> so as I was commanded כֵּ֠לַי <WH3627> my stuff הוֹצֵ֜אתִי <WH3318> I brought forth כִּכְלֵ֤י <WH3627> as stuff גוֹלָה֙ <WH1473> for captivity יוֹמָ֔ם <WH3119> by day וּבָעֶ֛רֶב <WH6153> and in the even חָתַֽרְתִּי־ <WH2864> I digged לִ֥י בַקִּ֖יר <WH7023> through the wall בְּיָ֑ד <WH3027> with mine hand בָּעֲלָטָ֥ה <WH5939> in the twilight הוֹצֵ֛אתִי <WH3318> I brought [it] forth עַל־ <WH5921> above כָּתֵ֥ף <WH3802> [it] upon [my] shoulder נָשָׂ֖אתִי <WH5375> [and] I bare לְעֵינֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5869> in their sight פ
וַיְהִ֧י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> came the word יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֖י <WH413> in בַּבֹּ֥קֶר <WH1242> And in the morning לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> of man הֲלֹ֨א <WH3808> not אָמְר֥וּ <WH559> said אֵלֶ֛יךָ <WH413> has not בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> hath not the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house הַמֶּ֑רִי <WH4805> the rebellious מָ֖ה <WH4100> What אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> What עֹשֶֽׂה׃ <WH6213> unto thee What doest

אֱמֹ֣ר <WH559> Say אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH413> to כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֖ר <WH559> thou unto them Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהֹוִ֑ה <WH3069> GOD הַנָּשִׂ֞יא <WH5387> [concerneth] the prince הַמַּשָּׂ֤א <WH4853> This burden הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> This בִּיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem וְכָל־ <WH3605> all בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> and all the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who הֵ֥מָּה <WH1992> like בְתוֹכָֽם׃ <WH8432> that [are] among

אֱמֹ֖ר <WH559> Say אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I am מֽוֹפֶתְכֶ֑ם <WH4159> I [am] your sign כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> to you עָשִׂ֗יתִי <WH6213> like as I have done כֵּ֚ן <WH3651> so יֵעָשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> so shall it be done לָהֶ֔ם בַּגּוֹלָ֥ה <WH1473> unto them they shall remove בַשְּׁבִ֖י <WH7628> into captivity יֵלֵֽכוּ׃ <WH1980> will go

וְהַנָּשִׂ֨יא <WH5387> And the prince אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who בְּתוֹכָ֜ם <WH8432> that [is] among אֶל־ <WH413> to כָּתֵ֤ף <WH3802> upon [his] shoulder יִשָּׂא֙ <WH5375> them shall bear בָּעֲלָטָ֣ה <WH5939> in the twilight וְיֵצֵ֔א <WH3318> and shall go forth בַּקִּ֥יר <WH7023> through the wall יַחְתְּר֖וּ <WH2864> they shall dig לְה֣וֹצִיא <WH3318> to carry out ב֑וֹ פָּנָ֣יו <WH6440> his face יְכַסֶּ֔ה <WH3680> thereby he shall cover יַ֗עַן <WH3282> that אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who לֹא־ <WH3808> not יִרְאֶ֥ה <WH7200> he see לַעַ֛יִן <WH5869> with [his] eyes ה֖וּא <WH1931> he אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> not the ground

וּפָרַשְׂתִּ֤י <WH6566> also will I spread אֶת־ <WH853> רִשְׁתִּי֙ <WH7568> My net עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> over וְנִתְפַּ֖שׂ <WH8610> upon him and he shall be taken בִּמְצֽוּדָתִ֑י <WH4686> in my snare וְהֵבֵאתִ֨י <WH935> and I will bring אֹת֤וֹ <WH853> בָבֶ֙לָה֙ <WH894> him to Babylon אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> [to] the land כַּשְׂדִּ֔ים <WH3778> of the Chaldeans וְאוֹתָ֥הּ <WH853> לֹֽא־ <WH3808> he will not יִרְאֶ֖ה <WH7200> yet shall he not see וְשָׁ֥ם <WH8033> there יָמֽוּת׃ <WH4191> it though he shall die

וְכֹל֩ <WH3605> to every אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who סְבִיבֹתָ֥יו <WH5439> all that [are] about [עֶזְרֹה כ] (עֶזְרֹ֛ו <WH5828> help ק) וְכָל־ <WH3605> all אֲגַפָּ֖יו <WH102> him and all his bands אֱזָרֶ֣ה <WH2219> And I will scatter לְכָל־ <WH3605> and all ר֑וּחַ <WH7307> toward every wind וְחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> the sword אָרִ֥יק <WH7324> and I will draw out אַחֲרֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH310> after

וְיָדְע֖וּ <WH3045> And they shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD בַּהֲפִיצִ֤י <WH6327> when I shall scatter אוֹתָם֙ <WH853> בַּגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> them among the nations וְזֵרִיתִ֥י <WH2219> and disperse אוֹתָ֖ם <WH853> בָּאֲרָצֽוֹת׃ <WH776> them in the countries

וְהוֹתַרְתִּ֤י <WH3498> But I will leave מֵהֶם֙ <WH1992> like אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH376> a מִסְפָּ֔ר <WH4557> a few מֵחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> of them from the sword מֵרָעָ֣ב <WH7458> from the famine וּמִדָּ֑בֶר <WH1698> and from the pestilence לְמַ֨עַן <WH4616> because of יְסַפְּר֜וּ <WH5608> that they may declare אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all תּוֹעֲבֽוֹתֵיהֶ֗ם <WH8441> all their abominations בַּגּוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> among the heathen אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> they בָּ֣אוּ <WH935> whither they come שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> in it וְיָדְע֖וּ <WH3045> and they shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD פ
וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> Moreover the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came to me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> of man לַחְמְךָ֖ <WH3899> thy bread בְּרַ֣עַשׁ <WH7494> with quaking תֹּאכֵ֑ל <WH398> eat וּמֵימֶ֕יךָ <WH4325> thy water בְּרָגְזָ֥ה <WH7269> with trembling וּבִדְאָגָ֖ה <WH1674> and with carefulness תִּשְׁתֶּֽה׃ <WH8354> and drink

וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> And say אֶל־ <WH413> to עַ֣ם <WH5971> unto the people הָאָ֡רֶץ <WH127> of the land כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֩ <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֨י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֜ה <WH3069> GOD לְיוֹשְׁבֵ֤י <WH3427> of the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> of Jerusalem אֶל־ <WH413> of אַדְמַ֣ת <WH776> [and] of the land יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel לַחְמָם֙ <WH3899> their bread בִּדְאָגָ֣ה <WH1674> with carefulness יֹאכֵ֔לוּ <WH398> They shall eat וּמֵֽימֵיהֶ֖ם <WH4325> their water בְּשִׁמָּמ֣וֹן <WH8078> with astonishment יִשְׁתּ֑וּ <WH8354> and drink לְמַ֜עַן <WH4616> because תֵּשַׁ֤ם <WH3456> may be desolate אַרְצָהּ֙ <WH776> that her land מִמְּלֹאָ֔הּ <WH4393> from all that is therein מֵחֲמַ֖ס <WH2555> because of the violence כָּֽל־ <WH3605> of all הַיֹּשְׁבִ֥ים <WH3427> of all them that dwell בָּֽהּ׃

וְהֶעָרִ֤ים <WH5892> And the cities הַנּֽוֹשָׁבוֹת֙ <WH3427> that are inhabited תֶּחֱרַ֔בְנָה <WH2717> shall be laid waste וְהָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> and the land שְׁמָמָ֣ה <WH8077> shall be desolate תִֽהְיֶ֑ה <WH1961> become וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ם <WH3045> and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD פ
וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> And the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> Son אָדָ֗ם <WH120> of man מָֽה־ <WH4100> what הַמָּשָׁ֤ל <WH4912> what [is] that proverb הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> is this לָכֶ֔ם עַל־ <WH5921> you have concerning אַדְמַ֥ת <WH127> [that] ye have in the land יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying יַֽאַרְכוּ֙ <WH748> are prolonged הַיָּמִ֔ים <WH3117> The days וְאָבַ֖ד <WH6> faileth כָּל־ <WH3605> and every חָזֽוֹן׃ <WH2377> and every vision

לָכֵ֞ן <WH3651> Therefore אֱמֹ֣ר <WH559> Tell אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH413> to כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֮ <WH559> them therefore Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִה֒ <WH3068> GOD הִשְׁבַּ֙תִּי֙ <WH7673> to cease אֶת־ <WH853> הַמָּשָׁ֣ל <WH4912> I will make this proverb הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> will no יִמְשְׁל֥וּ <WH4911> and they shall no more use it as a proverb אֹת֛וֹ <WH853> ע֖וֹד <WH5750> longer בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> in Israel כִּ֚י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> but דַּבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> but say אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH413> about קָֽרְבוּ֙ <WH7126> are at hand הַיָּמִ֔ים <WH3117> unto them The days וּדְבַ֖ר <WH1697> and the effect כָּל־ <WH3605> of every חָזֽוֹן׃ <WH2377> of every vision

כִּ֠י <WH3588> there לֹ֣א <WH3808> will no יִֽהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become ע֛וֹד <WH5750> longer כָּל־ <WH3605> be any חֲז֥וֹן <WH2377> vision שָׁ֖וְא <WH7723> For there shall be no more any vain וּמִקְסַ֣ם <WH4738> divination חָלָ֑ק <WH2509> nor flattering בְּת֖וֹךְ <WH8432> within בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> the house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> for אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> For I [am] the LORD אֲדַבֵּר֙ <WH1696> I will speak אֵת֩ <WH853> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> and whatever אֲדַבֵּ֤ר <WH1696> that I shall speak דָּבָר֙ <WH1697> and the word וְיֵ֣עָשֶׂ֔ה <WH6213> shall come to pass לֹ֥א <WH3808> will no תִמָּשֵׁ֖ךְ <WH4900> it shall be no more prolonged ע֑וֹד <WH5750> longer כִּ֣י <WH3588> in בִֽימֵיכֶ֞ם <WH3117> for in your days בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house הַמֶּ֗רִי <WH4805> O rebellious אֲדַבֵּ֤ר <WH1696> will I say דָּבָר֙ <WH1697> the word וַעֲשִׂיתִ֔יו <WH6213> and will perform נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> it saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD פ
וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> Again the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came to me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> Son אָדָ֗ם <WH120> of man הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> behold בֵֽית־ <WH1004> behold [they of] the house יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel אֹֽמְרִ֔ים <WH559> say הֶחָז֛וֹן <WH2377> The vision אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after ה֥וּא <WH1931> he חֹזֶ֖ה <WH2372> that he seeth לְיָמִ֣ים <WH3117> days רַבִּ֑ים <WH7227> [is] for many וּלְעִתִּ֥ים <WH6256> of the times רְחוֹק֖וֹת <WH7350> [that are] far ה֥וּא <WH1931> he נִבָּֽא׃ <WH5012> [to come] and he prophesieth

לָכֵ֞ן <WH3651> Therefore אֱמֹ֣ר <WH559> Therefore say אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH413> to כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> unto them Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD לֹא־ <WH3808> not תִמָּשֵׁ֥ךְ <WH4900> be prolonged ע֖וֹד <WH5750> any כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner דְּבָרָ֑י <WH1697> There shall none of my words אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> I אֲדַבֵּ֤ר <WH1696> which I have spoken דָּבָר֙ <WH1697> any more but the word וְיֵ֣עָשֶׂ֔ה <WH6213> shall be done נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD ס
